description:
Koma and Tora argue about who the strongest person on Third Street is, so they hold a tournament! But because of this tournament, a certain someone feels like he was the weakest guy on Third Street.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3-Choume Saikyou no Otoko / 3-Choume Saijaku no Otoko
3丁目最強の男 / 3丁目最弱の男
The Strongest Guy on Third Street / The Weakest Guy on Third Street
